January 10, 1956
Dear Kraik:
The enclosed copy will give you an idea of what I want by sending
it to yai • Paul Street invited me to come to Washington to discuss a
possible NA.EB series but I can *t go now. If you or Harry should be in
Washington aid had a few minutes, you might call him at NEA offices
and talk with him. If you aren *t able to do this by March or April,
and they still want me to come, 1*11 fly up there fcr a day and talk
with them.
Hope things are perking well; let me know if you want my group
to do aiything further re: my report.
